videooutput: Can be selected from NTSC and PAL
exposurecontrol: Programmed auto exposure and exposure compensation (-2.0 - +2.0 EV in steps of 1/3 EV)
weight: Approx. 153 g (5.4 oz) (including battery and SD memory card)
meteringmode: Matrix, center-weighted (digital zoom less than 2x), spot (digital zoom 2x or more)
chargingtime: Approx. 3 h (when using Charging AC Adapter EH-70P and when no charge remains)
speed: 1/2000-1 s 1/4000 s (maximum speed during high-speed continuous shooting) 4 s (Fireworks show scene mode)
ioterminal: Audio/video (A/V) output; digital I/O (USB) HDMI micro connector (Type D) (HDMI output)
hdmioutput: Can be selected from Auto, 480p, 720p, and 1080i
continuousshooting: Single (default setting), Continuous H (images are captured continuously at a rate of about 10 fps), Continuous L (up to 6 images are captured continuously at a rate of up to about 2 fps), Pre-shooting cache (frame rate: up to 18 fps / number of frames: up to 5 frames), Continuous H: 120 fps (50 frames are captured at a speed of about 1/125 s or faster), Continuous H: 60 fps (25 frames are captured at a speed of about 1/60 s or faster), BSS (Best Shot Selector), Multi-shot 16
monitor: 7.5 cm (3-in.), approx. 460k-dot, TFT LCD with anti-reflection coating and 5-level brightness adjustment
media: Internal memory (approx. 25 MB), SD/SDHC/SDXC memory card
powersources: One Rechargeable Li-ion Battery EN-EL19 (included) AC Adapter EH-62G (available separately)
selftimer: Can be selected from 10 s and 2 s
focallength: 4.5-54.0 mm (angle of view equivalent to that of 25-300 mm lens in 35 mm [135] format)
dimensionswxhxd: Approx. 95.4 x 58.3 x 26.3 mm (3.8 x 2.3 x 1.1 in.) (excluding projections)
suppliedaccessories: Camera Strap, Rechargeable Li-ion Battery EN-EL19 (with battery case), Charging AC Adapter EH-70P, USB Cable UC-E6, Audio Video Cable EG-CP16, ViewNX 2 CD, Reference Manual CD
construction: 8 elements in 8 groups (1 ED lens element)
focusrange: [W]: Approx. 50 cm (1 ft 8 in.) to infinity, [T]: Approx. 1.5m (5 ft) to infinity Macro mode: Approx. 8 cm (3.2 in.) to infinity (wide-angle position) (All distances measured from center of front surface of lens)
flashcontrol: TTL auto flash with monitor preflashes
communicationsprotocols: IEEE 802.11b: DBPSK/DQPSK/CCK IEEE 802.11g: OFDM IEEE 802.11n: OFDM
fileformats: Still pictures: JPEG 3D images: MPO Sound files (Voice Memo): WAV Movies: MOV (Video: H.264/MPEG-4 AVC, Audio: AAC stereo)
focusareaselection: Face priority, manual with 99 focus areas, center, subject tracking, target finding AF
supportedlanguages: Arabic, Bengali, Chinese (Simplified and Traditional), Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hindi, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Marathi, Norwegian, Persian, Polish, Portuguese (European and Brazilian), Romanian, Russian, Spanish, Swedish, Tamil, Telugu, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
framecoverageplaybackmode: Approx. 99% horizontal and 99% vertical (compared to actual picture)
filesystem: DCF, Exif 2.3, DPOF, and MPF compliant
shootingmodes: Auto, Scene (Scene auto selector, Portrait, Landscape, Sports, Night portrait, Party/indoor, Beach, Snow, Sunset, Dusk/dawn, Night landscape, Close-up, Food, Museum, Fireworks show, Black and white copy, Backlighting, Easy panorama, Pet portrait, 3D photography), Special effects, Smart portrait
imagesensor: 1/2.3-in. type CMOS; approx. 16.79 million total pixels
dataratesactualmeasuredvalues: IEEE 802.11b: 5 Mbps IEEE 802.11g: 20 Mbps IEEE 802.11n: 20 Mbps
digitalzoommagnification: Up to 4x (angle of view equivalent to that of approx. 1200 mm lens in 35mm [135] format)
optionalaccessories: Battery Charger MH-66, AC Adapter EH-62G
framecoverageshootingmode: Approx. 99% horizontal and 99% vertical (compared to actual picture)
isosensitivitystandardoutputsensitivity: ISO 125-1600 ISO 3200 (available when using Auto mode)
